title: Google\Cloud\Security\PrivateCA\V1\CaPool\IssuancePolicy\AllowedKeyType\EcKeyType
name: EcKeyType
description:
Describes an Elliptic Curve key that may be used in a [Certificate][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate] issued from a [CaPool][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CaPool].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CaPool.IssuancePolicy.AllowedKeyType.EcKeyType

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.signature_algorithm
params.description: Optional. A signature algorithm that must be used. If this is omitted, any EC-based signature algorithm will be allowed.
